Package components

Interface Node

All Known Implementing Classes:
Branch, Customer, Hub, NonStandardTruck, StandardTruck, Truck, Van
public interface Node
Represents a location (vehicle or branch)
Version:
1.0, 9/4/2021
Author:
Itzik Rahamim - 312202351, Gil Ben Hamo - 315744557

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void collectPackage​(Package p)
    Collect the package to the current node
    void deliverPackage​(Package p)
    Remove the package from the current node
    java.lang.String getName()
    Get the name of the current node
    default void handlePackage​(Package p, Node source, Node dest, Status status)
    Take care to transfer the package and add a record to the package tracking
    void work()
    Current node makes 1 unit of his specific work

  • Method Details

    • collectPackage

      void collectPackage​(Package p)
      Collect the package to the current node
      Parameters:
      p - - The package we want to collect

    • deliverPackage

      void deliverPackage​(Package p)
      Remove the package from the current node
      Parameters:
      p - - The package we want to deliver

    • work

      void work()
      Current node makes 1 unit of his specific work

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of the current node
      Returns:
      The name of this location

    • handlePackage

      default void handlePackage​(Package p, Node source, Node dest, Status status)
      Take care to transfer the package and add a record to the package tracking
      Parameters:
      p - - The package
      source - - Who delivers the package
      dest - - Who collects the package
      status - - New status of the package
